turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'm hungry. Can we get some chow?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah of course. What'd you have in mind?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I feel like pizza. Let's go for Pizza Hut

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure.. give me one second to pull up the menu

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No problem

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright.. ready.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What'll it be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm not sure. Are there any specials? I want to feed about half a dozen people

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have an add-wings-and-soda deal right now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nah, not in the mood for wings.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Everything's pretty cheap, especially the large pies, why not just order a couple?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Right. Let's go with a large cheese, a large pepperoni, and a large half Hawaiian half veggie

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you read that back?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Large cheese, large pepperoni, large half veggie half hawaiian

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Anything else? Drinks, bread sticks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think that'll do it for food, but actually yeah let's throw in a couple sodas as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. OK, the order is placed. It should be delivered in about 25 minutes. They'll text you the receipt.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Have a good night.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye!

items.name: Got it. OK, the order is placed
